name: Underpowered Heavy Mounts
desc: This ship's impressive shielding has come at the cost of power dedicated to offensive systems. Increases the ordnance point cost of large energy weapons by %s.
short: Increases ordnance point cost of large energy weapons.

name: Ground Attack Craft
desc: This ship's capable of performing attacks runs on ground targets in atmospheric conditions. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s, up to the total number of marines in the fleet.
